original_text: The carpenter stretcheth out his rule; he marketh it out with a line; he fitteth it with planes, and he marketh it out with the compass, and maketh it after the figure of a man, according to the beauty of a man; that it may remain in the house.
korean_text: 목공은 줄을 늘여 재고 붓으로 긋고 대패로 밀고 곡선자로 그어 사람의 아름다움을 따라 사람의 모양을 만들어 집에 두게 하며

sentences.original_text: The carpenter stretcheth out his rule
he marketh it out with a line
he marketh it out with the compass
and maketh it after the figure of a man
according to the beauty of a man
that it may remain in the house
